name: Camping is harder than you think
name_original: Camping is harder than you think
description:
I made this game in 3 days for a game jam, and I'm so excited to participate to more and more game jams!

I like the mechanic of upgrades, and because of that I tried to make a similar mechanic to upgrade your bow, heal your campfire, and food for your hungry! Try to go as far as possible in my game!
